message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 reflects the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate the compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $14,000. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make it work within my budget.
